
## Class : musculature of lower limb

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0004482
 * *Label* = musculature of lower limb
 * *Definition* = Any collection of muscles that is part of a hindlimb [Automatically generated definition].
